name: Rigatoni with Italian Chicken
ingredients: 28 oz. diced tomatoes with Italian herbs
instructions: Dice chicken and place in Ziplock bag; add Italian dressing and marinate 30 minutes. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to pkg. directions and drain.

Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Scoop chicken into large pot, allowing some marinade to go with it; discard remaining marinade. Add diced tomatoes and cook 15 minutes or so, seasoning with red pepper and parsley. Serve over pasta and sprinkle with cheese.
